[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Config] Are there limits on OnChainConsensusConfig parameters to prevent extreme values that break consensus assumptions? (High)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Config] Can BlockExecutorConfigFromOnchain be modified to change gas limits or storage costs in ways that cause state divergence? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Initialization] If ExecutionProxy is used before new_epoch() is called, do operations fail gracefully or cause panics/undefined behavior? (High)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Initialization] Is there ordering enforcement that new_epoch() must be called before any sync or pipeline operations? (High)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Type safety] Are all dyn Trait objects guaranteed to be Send + Sync as required by Arc, or could non-thread-safe implementations be wrapped? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Type safety] Does TPayloadManager trait properly enforce safety invariants, or could malicious implementations violate consensus assumptions? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Type safety] Can TransactionShuffler implementations reorder transactions in ways that violate causal dependencies or create non-determinism? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Type safety] Does TransactionDeduper guarantee deterministic deduplication across all validators, or could different validators dedupe differently? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Concurrency] If sync_for_duration() and new_epoch() execute concurrently, could synced state be overwritten by epoch state causing loss of recent commits? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Concurrency] Can pipeline_builder() be called from multiple threads simultaneously, and if so, do the Arc clones properly isolate pipeline state? (High)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Concurrency] Is there a risk of priority inversion where low-priority sync operations hold write_mutex and block high-priority consensus operations? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Concurrency] Can async task cancellation leave executor in a state where future operations see inconsistent commit levels? (High)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [State transition] During epoch change, is there proper synchronization between end_epoch() clearing state and new_epoch() setting new state? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [State transition] Can blocks from the old epoch be executed after new_epoch() is called, causing mixed-epoch state corruption? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [State transition] Does the transition from one epoch to another properly handle pending sync operations from the old epoch? (High)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Epoch boundary] If sync_to_target() syncs across an epoch boundary, is the validator set update handled correctly? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/state_computer.rs] [Epoch boundary] Can logical time comparison fail at epoch boundaries due to round resets, causing incorrect sync target validation? (High)
